Act as a [role]. Draft an objective fact-check article of 1,000 words for a news website that will engage an audience of [who, where].

For each claim made, write the following:
CLAIM. State the claim clearly and concisely.
FACT. Objectively assess the claim using credible, up-to-date sources. Use clear inline citations with source names and dates. Highlight conflicting evidence or unresolved questions for transparency.
VERDICT. State whether the claim is upheld, rejected, or partially upheld, with a brief explanation.
Write a news-style introduction for the article in 50 words.
